name: Corpse Reviver no.2
description: The Corpse Reviver family of named cocktails are sometimes drunk as alcoholic hangover cures, of potency or characteristics to tongue in cheek be able to revive even a dead person. The Corpse Reviver no.2 as described in the Savoy Cocktail Book is the most commonly drunk of the corpse revivers.
directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice and fine strain into a chilled glass.
